statements: SELECT * FROM recipes;
SELECT title, description FROM recipes WHERE author_id = 1;
SELECT ingredients[1] FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM comments ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT recipe_id, COUNT(comment_id) AS comments_count FROM comments GROUP BY recipe_id;
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE author_id = 1 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT title, description FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id = 5;
SELECT recipe_id, ingredients[1] AS main_ingredient FROM recipes WHERE array_length(ingredients, 1) > 0;
SELECT r.title, c.comment FROM recipes r JOIN comments c ON r.recipe_id = c.recipe_id WHERE c.user_id = 10 ORDER BY c.created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT AVG(page_views) AS avg_page_views, MAX(time_spent) AS max_time_spent, MIN(unique_visitors) AS min_unique_visitors FROM analytics WHERE date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM recipe_archive WHERE recipe_id = 1;
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients FROM recipe_archive ORDER BY date_published DESC;
SELECT recipe_name, instructions FROM recipe_archive WHERE date_published > '2021-01-01';
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients[1], instructions FROM recipe_archive WHERE recipe_name ILIKE '%chicken%';
SELECT recipe_name, COUNT(comment_id) AS num_comments FROM recipe_archive LEFT JOIN user_comments ON recipe_archive.recipe_id = user_comments.recipe_id GROUP BY recipe_name;
SELECT * FROM recipe_archive WHERE recipe_id = 1;
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients FROM recipe_archive WHERE date_published = '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, comment FROM user_comments WHERE recipe_id = 2 ORDER BY date_posted DESC;
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients FROM recipe_archive WHERE recipe_id IN (3, 5) AND recipe_name LIKE 'Pasta%';
SELECT recipe_name, instructions FROM recipe_archive WHERE ingredients @> ARRAY['tomato', 'cheese'];
SELECT recipe_id, recipe_name FROM recipe_archive;
SELECT * FROM user_comments WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT ingredients, instructions FROM recipe_archive WHERE recipe_id = 5;
SELECT comment_text, created_at FROM user_comments ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT page_url, visit_timestamp, user_id FROM website_analytics LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM recipe_archive WHERE recipe_id = 1
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients FROM recipe_archive WHERE recipe_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY recipe_id DESC
SELECT recipe_name, instructions FROM recipe_archive WHERE recipe_name LIKE '%pasta%'
SELECT * FROM user_comments WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY created_at ASC
SELECT * FROM website_analytics WHERE user_id = 3 AND page_url LIKE '%home%'
SELECT * FROM recipes;
SELECT id, title, author FROM recipes ORDER BY author ASC;
SELECT id, author, instructions FROM recipes WHERE id = 3;
SELECT user_name, comment FROM comments WHERE recipe_id = 5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, author FROM recipes WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT user_name, comment FROM comments WHERE recipe_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_name FROM comments WHERE user_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT page_id, action, timestamp FROM analytics WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM recipes;
SELECT title, ingredients FROM recipes WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, title, created_at FROM recipes ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, role FROM user_roles GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT title, ingredients FROM recipes WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, title, ingredients, directions FROM recipes WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id IN (SELECT user_id FROM comments WHERE recipe_id = 2);
SELECT user_id, role FROM user_roles WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT id, user_visits, pageviews, bounce_rate FROM website_analytics ORDER BY user_visits DESC LIMIT 5;
